name: Typecoon
description:
An ENGLISH word appears on the screen and you have to TRANSLATE it to LITHUANIAN language (don't worry, zombie bunnies will carry hints) to continue.

Game made for #tagjam19 long time ago.

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/avaren
I would recommend to disable the music while recording videos for Youtube, since occasional copyright claims happen even with Avaren music being royalty free and available to use freely (with attribution).
